    • 方法详细资料

      • encodeNewline

        public static final java.lang.String encodeNewline(java.lang.String str)
        Encodes the given line (replaces \\ with \\\\, \r with \\r and \n with \\n).
        参数:
        str - The string to encode.
        返回:
        The modified string.

      • decodeNewline

        public static final java.lang.String decodeNewline(java.lang.String str)
        Decodes the given line (replaces \\\\ with \\, \\r with \r and \\n with \n).
        参数:
        str - The string to decode.
        返回:
        The modified string.

      • listFilesRecursively

        public static java.util.Collection<java.io.File> listFilesRecursively(java.nio.file.Path startDirectory,
                                                                      java.lang.String postfixRegexNamePattern)
        参数:
        startDirectory -
        postfixRegexNamePattern - to be used for the matching
        返回:
        all matching files within the given startDirectory and all its subdirectories
